definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="get_localized_text"><value name="key"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">translation.key.king_overthrow</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="strike_lightning"><field name="effectOnly">TRUE</field><value name="x"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:CAPITAL_X</field></block></value><value name="y"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:CAPITAL_Y</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:CAPITAL_Z</field></block></value><next><block type="world_set_downfall"><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">CreateCrown</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
